name: Robot Hologram Super Party
description:
Welcome to Robot Hologram Super Party!

ZX-87, one of CyberCorp's oldest robot creations, has just been upgraded with a new Cybertronic Processing Unit. The upgrade is state of the art, and allows the recipient to process data more efficiently than even the fastest supercomputer! CyberCorp wants to evaluate ZX-87 through their numerous Robot Time Trials. The trials are filled with puzzles and obstacles, designed to test the robot's processing power. ZX-87 has been around the block more than a few times with these trials, but this set of tests is CyberCorp's most difficult yet. Can our electronic protagonist complete the trials? Or will he become scrap metal?!

Controls:

A/D/Left/Right - Move Left and Right 

Space - Jump 

Esc - Open/Close Pause Menu
